backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, help requests, lesson categories and lessons with sorting utilities and access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding update features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata and the document title to "learning& Earning".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and rendering pages inside AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header navigation, brand text, footer links, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the static logo image with alt text "learning& Earning Logo".
frontend/src/components/guided-form/form: Defines preset form templates for job applications, surveys, and platform registrations, including fields, metadata, and examples.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/Guid: Multi-step guided form wizard handling template selection, field validation, navigation, and WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/type: Provides TypeScript types for form templates, fields, form data, and validation results.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/vali: Implements field-level and form-level validation for required fields, email formats, and phone numbers.
Renders the hero section for the Learn page with heading text and an illustrative image.
frontend/src/components/learn/LessonList: Displays lessons grouped by category with loading states, filtering, and navigation to individual lessons.
frontend/src/components/learn/ScamAwaren: Shows a checklist of scam red flags and green flags using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/support/HelpRequ: Implements a help request form with validation, submission handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch lessons, categories, disclaimers, support info, and submit help requests via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes with green and orange accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactSupportPage.ts: Displays support contact info, security reminders, and a help request form.
frontend/src/pages/GuidedFormFillingPage: Presents a guided form-filling wizard with instructions and overview content.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Shows learning resources, disclaimers, categories, and a scam awareness checklist.
frontend/src/pages/LessonDetailPage.tsx: Renders detailed lesson content with reading time, tags, disclaimers, and a checklist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and managing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and enables typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current features, and pending requests related to updating the website branding to "learning& Earning".
